Package Node

Interface BaseNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
Contestant, FixtureNode, FixtureNode, myNode, Simulator
public interface BaseNode
The BaseNode interface represents a base interface for the node class to be available for the Simulator.Simulator. onStart: to initial the node. It receive the UUID for all the nodes in the cluster. onStop: is called whenever the node wants to terminate. It is used for collecting garbage and possibly obtain certain log. onNewMessage: is used for communication between the node itself and other nodes

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BaseNode newInstance​(java.util.UUID selfID, MiddleLayer network)
    This method serves as a factory for new node instances.
    void onCreate​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.UUID> allID)
    Activated by the Simulator.Simulator on the creation of a new node and is used to initialize the node parameters
    void onNewMessage​(java.util.UUID originID, Event msg)
    A channel for a node to receive a new event from other nodes.
    void onStart()
    Activated by the Simulator.Simulator after all the nodes in the cluster become ready
    void onStop()
    Activated by the Simulator.Simulator just before the node shuts down.

  • Method Details

    • onCreate

      void onCreate​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.UUID> allID)
      Activated by the Simulator.Simulator on the creation of a new node and is used to initialize the node parameters
      Parameters:
      allID - the IDs of type UUID for all the nodes in the cluster

    • onStart

      void onStart()
      Activated by the Simulator.Simulator after all the nodes in the cluster become ready

    • onStop

      void onStop()
      Activated by the Simulator.Simulator just before the node shuts down.

    • onNewMessage

      void onNewMessage​(java.util.UUID originID, Event msg)
      A channel for a node to receive a new event from other nodes. The node will receive all the message through this method.
      Parameters:
      originID - the ID of the sender node
      msg - the content of the message

    • newInstance

      BaseNode newInstance​(java.util.UUID selfID, MiddleLayer network)
      This method serves as a factory for new node instances. It is supposed to return a new instance of the special node class
      Parameters:
      selfID - the ID of the new node
      network - communication network for the new node
      Returns:
      a new instance of the special node class
